text: Hĩndĩ ĩyo mbũtũ cia ita cia mũthamaki wa Babuloni nĩciarigiicĩirie Jerusalemu irĩtunyane, nake Jeremia ũrĩa mũnabii aahingĩrĩtwo kũu nja ya arangĩri thĩinĩ wa nyũmba ya mũthamaki wa Juda.32:2 Jeremia nĩahingĩrĩirio nja-inĩ ya arangĩri thĩinĩ wa nyũmba ya ũthamaki nĩ Mũthamaki Zedekia nginya rĩrĩa Jerusalemu yatunyanirwo.
